verbs.description: In [ARG0: language] [R-ARG0: that] [V: echoed] [ARG1: that of his accusers and critics] , President Donald Trump alleged on Twitter that special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigative team was " MEDDLING " in the upcoming midterm elections and blamed Democrats for " Collusion .
